Package org.eclipse.smarthome.config.discovery

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DiscoveryListener
    The DiscoveryListener interface for receiving discovery events.
    DiscoveryResult
    The DiscoveryResult is a container for one result of a discovery process.
    DiscoveryService
    The DiscoveryService is a service interface which each binding can implement to provide an auto discovery process for one or more Thing s.
    DiscoveryServiceCallback Deprecated
    The use of this callback is deprecated.
    DiscoveryServiceRegistry
    The DiscoveryServiceRegistry is a service interface which provides the following features.
    ExtendedDiscoveryService Deprecated
    The implementation of DiscoveryServiceCallback caused a cyclic dependency and will be removed in future versions.
    ScanListener
    The ScanListener interface for receiving scan operation events.
    UpnpDiscoveryParticipant Deprecated
    use org.eclipse.smarthome.config.discovery.upnp.UpnpDiscoveryParticipant instead.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractDiscoveryService
    The AbstractDiscoveryService provides methods which handle the DiscoveryListeners.
    DiscoveryResultBuilder
    The DiscoveryResultBuilder helps creating a DiscoveryResult through the builder pattern.
    DiscoveryServiceMock
    The DiscoveryServiceMock is a mock for a DiscoveryService which can simulate a working and faulty discovery.
    If this mock is configured to be faulty, an exception is thrown if the discovery is enforced or aborted.
    DiscoveryServiceMockOfBridge  
    DiscoveryServiceRegistryOSGiTest
    The DiscoveryServiceRegistryOSGiTest test checks if the concrete DiscoveryServiceRegistry implementation tracks all registered DiscoveryServices and if a registered listener is notified about the events fired by the accordingDiscoveryService.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    DiscoveryResultFlag
    The DiscoveryResultFlag class specifies a list of flags which a DiscoveryResult object can take.
